record.title: DESIGNATING SENATOR CHRISTOPHER BOND AS VICE CHAIR OF THE INTELLIGENCE COMMITTEE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, pursuant to the provisions of S. Res. 445 of the 108th Congress, I select Senator Bond of Missouri as Vice Chair of the Intelligence Committee.
Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
